passive.name: Chase
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>, and increases their CRIT Rate against enemies with HP percentage {{2, percent}}% or less by an extra <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer defeats an enemy, their ATK is increased by <orangeStrong>{{4, percent}}%</orangeStrong> for {{5}} turn(s).
